title: Implement Obsidian API Mocking for Test Environment
feature: Create comprehensive mock for Obsidian API modules to enable testing in CI/CD environment
description: The test suite for REQ-001 fails due to missing Obsidian API module. Implement proper mocking strategy to simulate Obsidian App, Vault, and other required components for reliable testing.
context: Test report REQ-001 identifies that tests cannot run without Obsidian API. This is a critical blocker for CI/CD pipeline.
